definitions.title: locust
definitions.body: (usu. Interp. as the multitudinous, but Dl:HWB 126 as = As. âribu, êribu, êribû, locust-swarm, from [[ארב]] devastate);—alw. abs. ´[[א]]:([[הָ]]);—usu. coll. locust-swarm, in sim. of swarm of invaders Ju Jdg 6:5, Jdg 7:12; oft. appar. the common species (‖ other species, cf. [[לְמִינוֹ]] Le 11:22): Je 46:23, Na 3:15 (sim. of multitude; ‖[[יֶלֶק ]]); as destructive Ex 10:4, Ex 10:12, Ex 10:13, Ex 10:14, Ex 10:14, Ex 10:19 a (all J), Ps 105:34 (‖[[יֶלֶק ]]), De 28:38 (vb. [[תסל]]), 1Ki 8:37 = 2Ch 6:28, Ps 78:46 (all + [[תָסִיל]]), Jn 1:4, Jn 1:4 (‖[[גָּזָם ]], [[יֶלָק]], [[חָסִיל]]), Jn 2:25 (‖ id.); as disappearing suddenly (sim.) Na 3:17 (‖[[גּוֹב גּוֹבַי ]]); as edible Le 11:22 (H; ‖[[סָלְעָם ]], [[חִרְגּׁל]], [[תָגָב]]); as well organized Pr 30:27 (cf. Jn 2:7, Jn 2:8); of single locust, [[אֶחָד]] ´[[א]]: Ex 10:19 (J), as leaping (sim.) Job 39:20, as shaken out of garment (sim.) Ps 109:23 (v. II. [[נָעַר]]).—Cf. Dr:Jn 82 ff.
